Margaret,
 
Ron Is a friend and these comments where not directed toward h=
im.
I also own a mini box and am happy with it.
 
The difference is, when t=
he minibox was introduced for sale at 399.00 which is what I paid.
You coul=
d not obtain one any cheaper and Ron was not trying to exploit the needs an=
d desires of "new" researchers
in the field. If I'm not mistaken he has rep=
eatedly said that the minibox was primarily meant for experienced researche=
rs and 
paranormal investigating teams. And I believe he actually took a lo=
ss on the minibox.
 
On the other hand what you have on ebay are unscrupulo=
us individuals who see that they can pick up an item for 24.99
open it and =
cut a wire which takes about ten seconds from beginning to end. and then do=
uble the price plus shipping.
 
There is a name for it, I believe it is PRI=
CE GOUGING when there is a short or none existent supply of something and 
=
there are people or companies that hold some pieces of the product and sell=
 it at inflated prices to unwary individuals that feel a need to have it.
 =

In my book they are no more than thieves without guns. And should never be=
 patronised no matter what the circumstances.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ITCdeadpeople@...: Sat, 5 Apr 2008 16=
:13:04 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: boxes on ebay




Hi Bruce. That's wonde=
rful your are in a financial position to be so generous. :-) I don't know i=
f we can really go so far as to say that people who buy from eBay are recei=
ving units with the wrong kind of energy attached, just because profiting f=
rom sales isn't a course of action you or I, nor some others would take. If=
 that is the case, where do we draw the line? I paid a hefty price for my M=
iniBox, as have many others. I'm sure there is some profit involved there. =
The energy of it seems just fine to me and I hold no disregard toward Ron f=
or recognizing there is a market for his devices.Perhaps those who log onto=
 eBay looking to find something so they can experiment with automated sweep=
 feel it's their lucky day when they discover such a listing? Maybe they ev=
en feel it's a 'sign' that it's the right thing for them to do some researc=
h. And as far as the seller is concerned, we don't know what their attitude=
 or motivation is, unless we know them personally. Reminds me of a person o=
n the cleaning crew who used to steal the food from the fridge at one of my=
 corporate jobs. Everyone was so harsh and judgmental about it, until one d=
ay, we learned she was feeding her hungry children!Even if the person selli=
ng the units is the most greedy person in the world, I fully believe it is =
far more the attitude and intention of the person conducting the experiment=
s which influence the energy of communication devices, than the attitude of=
 the people selling the devices. It's my opinion WE are the ones who attrac=
t what comes through to us on our equipment, much more so than the equipmen=
t itself. Margaret--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday <paranorma=
linvestigating@...> wrote:>> > Guy's> > Do not give in to these demons that=
 are trying to make a buck from the research we love and the equipment we u=
se.> > I have given away including the shipping 5 RS boxes for free, 4, 470=
's and 1 469 all hacked by me.> I did not do it to gain popularity or even =
wanted a thank you. my sole motivation was to bring new people into the res=
earch and > in turn change someones life and perpetuate the idea of strengt=
h in numbers, in this case strength of communication.> > To all new people =
on this board, do not patronise these wolves that prey on the needs and wan=
ts of others. > The RS 20 -125 is everything the 470 & 469 are and a little=
 more. do not let the size or complicated button arrangement scare you off.=
> the hack is as simple as the others. > > Do not buy any RS hacks from eba=
y, they are sold with the wrong energy attached to them, spirit wise.> That=
 is why I and all other researchers should follow the example of a great ma=
n to whom we owe all of this research.> Mr. Frank Sumption, who was in a po=
sition at one time to make a substantial amount of money from his boxes and=

 had been asked of him by higher entities.> And that was to keep the resear=
ch pure for research sake. And that at no time was this equipment or knowle=
dge there of> to be for monetary gain.> > I adhere to this promise made by =
Frank to our friends on the other side and feel that there is no need to gi=
ve in to these box > extortionists. If a box is not attainable for a new pe=
rson yet, the right way. Then it probably is not their time yet.> > I have =
coined a phrase and believe in it. "The researcher does not choose the box,=
 the box chooses the researcher"> Be patient, those that do not yet have a =
box. We will do all we can to help you obtain one.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday=

bject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Few more traditional evp's> > > > > > No bodies at=

 As Bruce sayes the more people the better comunication we will have.> > Re=

Margaret,<BR>
 <BR>
Ron Is a friend and these comments whe=
re not directed toward him.<BR>
I also own a mini box and am happy with it.=
<BR>
 <BR>
The difference is, when the minibox was introduced for sale=
 at 399.00 which is what I paid.<BR>
You could not obtain one any cheaper a=
nd Ron was not trying to exploit the needs and desires of "new" researchers=

in the field. If I'm not mistaken he has repeatedly said that the mini=
box was primarily meant for experienced researchers and <BR>
paranormal inv=
estigating teams. And I believe he actually took a loss on the minibox.<BR>=

 <BR>
On the other hand what you have on ebay are unscrupulous indivi=
duals who see that they can pick up an item for 24.99<BR>
open it and cut a=
 wire which takes about ten seconds from beginning to end. and then double =
the price plus shipping.<BR>
 <BR>
There is a name for it, I believe i=
t is PRICE GOUGING when there is a short or none existent supply of somethi=
ng and <BR>
there are people or companies that hold some pieces of the prod=
uct and sell it at inflated prices to unwary individuals that feel a need t=
o have it.<BR>
 <BR>
In my book they are no more than thieves without =
guns. And should never be patronised no matter what the circumstances.<BR>

 <BR>
Bruce<BR><BR><BR>
